permissions.name: Read Site Data
permissions.description: Request permission to read the account's basic site info.

params.name: filter
params.doc:
Filter object. See [Filter and Sort](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/account-level-apis/sites/filter-&-sort) documentation.  
 Note: the `premium` and `appIds` filters are not supported in this endpoint.

docs.summary:
Retrieves the number of sites, given the provided [filtering](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/account-level-apis/sites/filter-&-sort).

  > **Important**: This call requires an account level API key and cannot be authenticated with the standard authorization header. API keys are currently available to selected beta users only.

examples.title: Count sites
body:
curl -X POST 'https://www.wixapis.com/site-list/v2/sites/count' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'Accept: application/json, text/plain, */*' \
  -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
  -H 'wix-account-id: <ACCOUNT ID>'
  --data-raw '{
    "filter":{"editorType":"EDITOR"}}' \

permissions.name: Read Site Data
permissions.description: Request permission to read the account's basic site info.

params.name: query
params.doc:
Filter and sorting with the following format:
`"filter" : { "displayName": "my-site" }`

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 1,000 sites, given the provided [paging, sorting and filtering](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/account-level-apis/sites/filter-&-sort).

 > **Important**: This call requires an account level API key and cannot be authenticated with the standard authorization header. API keys are currently available to selected beta users only.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through the result pages using `next` and `prev`. Returned if cursor paging is used.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Maximum number of items to return in the results.

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

Pass the relevant cursor token from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: order
members.doc: Sort order.

members.name: filter
sort
members.doc:
Sort object with the following format:
`[{"fieldName":"displayName","order":"ASC"},{"fieldName":"createdDate","order":"DESC"}]`

members.name: cursorPaging
id
members.doc: Site ID.

members.name: htmlAppId
members.doc: HTML app ID for the site.

members.name: name
members.doc: Site name. Used in the site's URL.

members.name: displayName
members.doc: Site display name. Used for display purposes, such as in the browser's tab name.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Site creation date.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Site updated date.

members.name: trashedDate
members.doc: Site trashed date.

members.name: published
members.doc: Whether the site is published.

members.name: premium
members.doc: Whether the site has a Wix Premium (paid) plan.

members.name: viewUrl
members.doc: Live site URL.

members.name: editUrl
members.doc: Editor site URL.

members.name: thumbnail
members.doc: Site thumbnail.

members.name: ownerAccountId
members.doc: Site owner's account ID.

members.name: contributorAccountIds
members.doc: Site contributors' account IDs.

members.name: editorType
members.doc: Site's Wix editor type.

members.name: blocked
members.doc: Whether Wix has blocked this site due to legal issues.

members.name: folderId
members.doc: Folder ID that contains this site. Empty if site is at root level.

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Namespace of the site, for internal use.

members.name: domainConnected
members.doc: Whether the site has a connected domain.

members.name: query
members.doc:
Filter and sorting with the following format:
`"filter" : { "displayName": "my-site" }`

members.name: sites
members.doc: List of retrieved sites.

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Paging information.

members.name: metadata
members.doc: Meta data about the returned sites

members.name: filter
members.doc:
Filter object. See [Filter and Sort](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/account-level-apis/sites/filter-&-sort) documentation.  
 Note: the `premium` and `appIds` filters are not supported in this endpoint.

members.name: count
members.doc:
Number of sites retrieved basd on the filter.
 Free Wix accounts are limited to max 1,000 sites.
 Premium accounts can have an unlimited number of sites.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_NAMESPACE
  • WIX - Default namespace for UGC sites. MetaSites with this namespace will be shown in a user's site list by default.
  • SHOUT_OUT - ShoutOut stand alone product. These are siteless (no actual Wix site, no HtmlWeb). MetaSites with this namespace will *not* be shown in a user's site list by default.
  • ALBUMS - MetaSites created by the Albums product, they appear as part of the Albums app. MetaSites with this namespace will *not* be shown in a user's site list by default.
  • WIX_STORES_TEST_DRIVE - Part of the WixStores migration flow, a user tries to migrate and gets this site to view and if the user likes it then stores removes this namespace and deletes the old site with the old stores. MetaSites with this namespace will *not* be shown in a user's site list by default.
  • HOTELS - Hotels standalone (siteless). MetaSites with this namespace will *not* be shown in a user's site list by default.
  • CLUBS - Clubs siteless MetaSites, a club without a wix website. MetaSites with this namespace will *not* be shown in a user's site list by default.
  • ONBOARDING_DRAFT - A partially created ADI website. MetaSites with this namespace will *not* be shown in a user's site list by default.
  • DEV_SITE - AppBuilder for AppStudio / shmite (c). MetaSites with this namespace will *not* be shown in a user's site list by default.
  • LOGOS - LogoMaker websites offered to the user after logo purchase. MetaSites with this namespace will *not* be shown in a user's site list by default.
  • VIDEO_MAKER - VideoMaker websites offered to the user after video purchase. MetaSites with this namespace will *not* be shown in a user's site list by default.
  • PARTNER_DASHBOARD - MetaSites with this namespace will *not* be shown in a user's site list by default.
  • DEV_CENTER_COMPANY - MetaSites with this namespace will *not* be shown in a user's site list by default.
  • HTML_DRAFT - A draft created by HTML editor on open. Upon "first save" it will be moved to be of WIX domain. Meta site with this namespace will *not* be shown in a user's site list by default.
  • SITELESS_BUSINESS - the user-journey for Fitness users who want to start from managing their business instead of designing their website. Will be accessible from Site List and will not have a website app. Once the user attaches a site, the site will become a regular wixsite.
  • CREATOR_ECONOMY - Belongs to "strategic products" company. Supports new product in the creator's economy space.
  • DASHBOARD_FIRST - * It is to be used in the Business First efforts.
  • ANYWHERE - * Bookings business flow with no site.
  • HEADLESS - * Namespace for Headless Backoffice with no editor
  • ACCOUNT_MASTER_CMS - * Namespace for master site that will exist in parent account that will be referenced by subaccounts The site will be used for account level CSM feature for enterprise
  • RISE - * Rise.ai Siteless account management for Gift Cards and Store Credit.
  • BRANDED_FIRST - * As part of the branded app new funnel, users now can create a meta site that will be branded app first. There's a blank site behind the scene but it's blank). The Mobile company will be the owner of this namespace.

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • EDITOR
  • ADI
  • EDITORX
  • STUDIO
